Text: Henry Resources, LLC, has been named as the primary investor in the Auto Investment Group, which will front the initial $13 million necessary to facilitate a plan out of bankruptcy.
Cause: facilitate a plan out of bankruptcy.
Effect: Henry Resources, LLC, has been named as the primary investor in the Auto Investment Group, which will front the initial $13 million
